steps.modified_description: Chop-Chop tomato into many small pieces

steps.description: add-add the chopped cilantro to the bowl
crack-crack one egg in a bowl
Heat-Heat 1 tbsp oil in a small non-stick frying pan
add-1/2 tsp ground black pepper to the bowl
Beat-Beat the contents of the bowl
cook-cook the tomatoes cut-side down until they start to soften and colour
steps.modified_description: cook the tomatoes cut-side down for several seconds

errors.description: cook the tomatoes cut-side down just several seconds, without waiting for they starting to soften and color

steps.description: Scoop-Scoop the tomatoes from the pan
steps.modified_description: Pour the tomatoes directly from the pan

steps.description: put-put tomatoes on a serving plate
Pour-Pour the egg mixture into the pan
stir-stir gently with a wooden spoon so the egg that sets on the base of the pan moves to enable the uncooked egg to flow into the space
steps.modified_description: stir-stir gently with a metal spoon so the egg that sets on the base of the pan moves to enable the uncooked egg to flow into the space

steps.description: Stop-Stop stirring when it's nearly cooked to allow it to set into an omelette
steps.modified_description: Stop-Stop stirring when it's fully cooked to allow it to small pieces

errors.description: set into small pieces instead of an omelette
Transfer-Transfer omelette to the plate and serve with the tomatoes
